title: No water supply for 3 days
description: Our locality has been facing severe water shortage for the past 3 days. Multiple households affected. Need urgent attention.

title: Power cut in residential area
description: Frequent power cuts lasting 4-5 hours daily in our area. Affecting work from home and students.

title: Large pothole causing accidents
description: Deep pothole on main road near school causing multiple vehicle accidents. Immediate repair required.

title: Water pipeline leak
description: Major water pipeline leakage near bus stop wasting thousands of liters daily.

title: Street lights not working
description: All street lights in our lane have been non-functional for 2 weeks. Safety concern at night.

title: Road waterlogging during rain
description: Main road gets completely waterlogged even with light rain. Drainage system blocked.

title: Contaminated water supply
description: Water supplied has foul smell and brownish color. Health hazard for residents.

title: Transformer making noise
description: Local transformer making loud buzzing sound and sparking occasionally. Risk of fire.

title: Road surface damage
description: Road surface completely damaged with multiple potholes. Vehicles getting stuck.

title: Low water pressure
description: Water pressure extremely low in mornings. Unable to fill overhead tanks.
